name: Crazy Cave Run
description:
Crazy Cave Run

Help the little dwarf  Groofrith Duskbrow escape the mine and collect as many treasures as possible. Fight your way through the narrow cave passages and buy upgrades with the collected crystals. How long can you last?

★ Run on eight paths in all dimensions!
★Challenge your skills in three different difficulty levels
★ Cross lava, crystals and minecarts in endless levels
★ Experience sweet graphics ★ Smooth 3D optics
★ Upgrade Groofrith and unleash crazy power-ups
